summary: The module defines data structures and helper utilities for identifying, iterating over, and filtering test targets used by Ansible's test suite. It provides base classes for completion and integration targets, an enumeration for target categories, and a collection of walk functions that traverse files matching specific test types (integration, sanity, unit, etc.). Additional placeholder utilities support pattern analysis, plugin reference extraction, and target filtering.
business_intent: Enable the Ansible testing infrastructure to locate, categorize, and manage test files, supporting selection, exclusion, and commandâ€‘line completion of test targets across different test types.
